hero.title: B.Tech in Civil Engineering
hero.intro: B. Tech in Civil Engineering is a 4-year program that focuses on planning infrastructure, with core domains like Structural Design, Geotechnical Engineering, Transportation Systems, Environmental Engineering, Construction Management, Surveying, materials engineering, etc. The program from the best engineering college in Dehradun prepares you for industry standards with career-ready skills.
